subject: Automobile Racing
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: The series closed out a troubled 2015 season in Sonoma, Calif., crowning a champion while grieving the death of one its most popular drivers in a freak accident a week earlier.
snippet: The series closed out a troubled 2015 season in Sonoma, Calif., crowning a champion while grieving the death of one its most popular drivers in a freak accident a week earlier.
